name: Syed Hasib Akhter Faruqui
body:
### Education
- UNIVERSITY OF TEXAS AT SAN ANTONIO, TEXASM.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering

  (Enrolled starting Fall-2015)

- KHULNA UNIVERSITY OF ENGINEERING & TECHNOLOGY (KUET), KHULNA

  B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering

### Research Experience
- [Numerical Analysis of Role of Bumpy Surface to Control the Flow Separation of an airfoil(Procedia Engineering (2014), pp. 255-260)](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S187770581402983X)

- [Numerical Investigation of Aerodynamic Characteristics for Flow Over a Car. (Undergraduate Thesis)]

### Skills & Abilities
**Programming Language:** C, FORTRAN, MATLAB, Python, R

**CAD Software:** AutoCAD, Autodesk Inventor, Inventor Fusion, Solidworks, PDMS

**Simulation Software:** ANSYS, Fluent, Gambit(Meshing)

**Graphics:** Photoshop, Illustrator 

**Office Package:** Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Visio, Publisher
